592770.name: Copter Besieged
592770.description:
Use your acrobatic flight skills to fight off invasions of escalating monster waves each lasting 20-90 seconds. Level up your copter and buy items to fill your copters 8 slots and optimise your monster fighting.

Invasions are set in scenic 200x200m arenas and typically last 45 minutes with plenty of unlockables and configurable difficulty.

LEARN TO FLY

The flight courses are a great way to learn to fly or a chill experience between games.

Prove your competence with obstacles and targets or up your competitive edge by racing against ghosts of previous runs, friends or leaderboard players.

CUSTOMISE YOUR LOADOUT

Choose your copter based on your desired approach to the invasion.

Select your starter weapon.

Between waves use earned level ups to upgrade your copter and collected coins to buy new items.

PHYSICS BASED FLIGHT

Flight mechanics are as realistic as possible while maximising the fun. Reverse thrust provides a seamless way to get off the ground and there is no propwash or zero thrust instability. 

Upgrade your copter between waves of invasions or test and try out copter builds at the flight circuits without limit.

The game is ideally played in full acrobatic mode where the copter doesn't fly for you but there is configurable auto-leveling and auto-thrust options that are intended to be reduced as you gain experience flying.

The tutorial guides you to choosing the best setup for your current skill level where the easiest option hovers and always returns to level when there is no user input.

FEATURES

  • Claim achievements to unlock items, copters, maps, difficulty levels, permanent enhancements and game modifiers.

  • Difficulty is customisable for all skill levels.

  • Physics based flight plus use experience earned to dynamically customise your copter build.

  • Collect coins dropped by monsters to purchase from the 100's of available items.

  • Short intense waves (20 - 90s) interleaved with level up and item shop.

  • Every item has a weight and power usage that effects your copters performance.

  • Flight circuit maps for a chill learning experience or race against ghosts. Includes difficulty adjustments with targets and obstacles.

  • 5 camera modes (1st person, 3rd person, leveled 3rd person, velocity based 3rd person or lock to target).  Leveled 3rd person locks the camera roll rotation and is shown in the trailers.
